remarks: Given a homotopy from ` F ` to ` G ` , produce a homotopy from ` G ` to ` F ` .  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
statement:
isphtpy.2 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( II Cn J ) ) $.
isphtpy.3 $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( II Cn J ) ) $.
phtpycom.6 $e |- K = ( x e. ( 0 [,] 1 ) , y e. ( 0 [,] 1 ) |-> ( x H ( 1 - y ) ) ) $.
phtpycom.7 $e |- ( ph -> H e. ( F ( PHtpy ` J ) G ) ) $.
phtpycom $p |- ( ph -> K e. ( G ( PHtpy ` J ) F ) ) $.
$d H x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d ph x y $.
